title: US Military Faces Ethical Dilemma Over Autonomous Weapons
description: Integrating artificial intelligence (AI) into military technologies has raised significant ethical concerns, particularly regarding developing and deploying autonomous weapons systems. A recent report by Public Citizen highlighted the potential dangers associated with the use of AI-driven weapons, warning against the dehumanization of targets and the risk of violating international human rights laws. Accountability issues and […]

title: SHIB Army makes waves in Binance community poll
description: The Shiba Inu community, famously known as the SHIB Army, has launched a vigorous campaign aimed at securing a listing for Bone ShibaSwap (BONE) on the globally recognized cryptocurrency exchange, Binance. Spearheaded by Lucie, the marketing lead of the Shiba Inu team, the campaign has garnered significant momentum as members rally together to support the […]

title: EA CEO Andrew Wilson Discusses the Role of AI in Video Game Development
description: In a recent tech conference, Electronic Arts (EA) CEO Andrew Wilson shared insights into the future of video game development, emphasizing the potential of artificial intelligence (AI) to revolutionize the industry.  Against a backdrop of recent studio closures, project cancellations, and layoffs within EA, Wilson’s remarks shed light on the company’s strategic direction in navigating […]
